Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model

Interface TurnObserver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardScreen, CLIBoardScreen, CLIConnectionErrorScreen, CLIConnectionScreen, CLIGodSelectionScreen, CLIMenuScreen, CLIPickGodScreen, CLIWinnerScreen, ConnectionErrorScreen, ConnectionScreen, CreditsScreen, GodSelectionScreen, GUIBoard, GUIConnection, GUIConnectionError, GUICredits, GUIGodSelection, GUIMenu, GUIPickGod, GUIWinner, MenuScreen, PickGodScreen, RemoteView, Screen, WinnerScreen
    public interface TurnObserver
extends Observer
    The interface implemented by each class that is observer of the Turn State

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void receiveActivePlayer​(Player player)
      Send to observer the player that is playing the current turn
      void receiveAllowedSquares​(Builder builder, java.util.List<Coordinate> allowedTiles, boolean specialPower)
      Send for a builder the tile where it could be moved or build
      void receiveBoard​(Board board)
      Send a Board update to the observer
      void receiveBuildersPositions​(java.util.List<Builder> builders)
      Send to observer a list with all builder objects in game
      void receiveTurnState​(Turn.State state, Player player)
      Send to observer the state of the turn
      void receiveUpdateDone()
      Notifies all observer that the update is done, and they could safely display the content

    • Method Detail

      • receiveTurnState

        void receiveTurnState​(Turn.State state,
                      Player player)
        Send to observer the state of the turn
        Parameters:
        state - The Turn.State representing the actual turn state
        player - The player playing in the current turn

      • receiveActivePlayer

        void receiveActivePlayer​(Player player)
        Send to observer the player that is playing the current turn
        Parameters:
        player - The player playing in the current turn

      • receiveAllowedSquares

        void receiveAllowedSquares​(Builder builder,
                           java.util.List<Coordinate> allowedTiles,
                           boolean specialPower)
        Send for a builder the tile where it could be moved or build
        Parameters:
        builder - The builder for which the allowed Squares are provided
        allowedTiles - The squares where the builder could make his action
        specialPower - The boolean that represents if the player could use a secialPower

      • receiveBoard

        void receiveBoard​(Board board)
        Send a Board update to the observer
        Parameters:
        board - The new Board object

      • receiveBuildersPositions

        void receiveBuildersPositions​(java.util.List<Builder> builders)
        Send to observer a list with all builder objects in game
        Parameters:
        builders - The list of builders

      • receiveUpdateDone

        void receiveUpdateDone()
        Notifies all observer that the update is done, and they could safely display the content
